versionGroup.description: Build a framework for Nex, including apis: 1) get user info with device id 2) create user with device id 3) update user social account info with account id + account type 4) update account action history
versionGroup.technology: 1) servlet + tomcat for web tier 2) nex module for service tier 3) mysql + ibatis for db tier 4) liquibase for db management 5) maven for project management 6) spring for some ioc issues
